title: Refactor the API handler to use async/await
notes: Complex session with tool_use and tool_result content blocks. User messages c-003 and c-005 contain only tool_result blocks; flatten_content returns empty for these so the reader skips them. The file-history-snapshot entry is also skipped. Final 4 messages: user(c-001), assistant+tool_use(c-002), assistant+tool_use(c-004), assistant(c-006).
